author: Business Risks
text:
An unhealed person finds offense in everything someone says or does.
A healed person, understands that the words and actions of others have absolutely nothing to do with his/her self.
YOU get to decide which person you will be in life!

text: Daylight Saving Time begins on Sunday, March 13, 2022 at 2:00 A.M. On Saturday night, clocks are set forward one hour (i.e., losing one hour) to “spring forward.”
